name: Humanize
description:
" In a world full of almost every inch of garbage, The world has abandoned us."

" ...Or are we the ones who have abandoned the world? "

------Story------- 

This world is full of rubbish Over 10% of the world's population has moved to floating islands. The remaining 90% is left on the waste-filled, polluted and uninhabitable planet.

[You] wake up in a huge pile of trash. Along with meeting a boy who saved you from the rubbish heap. No one knows why this place has become an abandoned world. The two decide to work together to find answers to this lonely world.

--------------------

Genre: Survival,Explorer,Tower Defense

Theme: WasteLand

Art: 2D Vectorart

--------------------

Instructions:

Play the game as a stage. In each stage, there is a target quest to do what needs to be done today to complete the quest. Targets in different levels Some checkpoints may be searching for things, and some are required to walk for resources to protect the base. Every time you finish the stage, you know the story of the game story. Once you've played the level, you can press on to the next stage.
